This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS A simple div should not have an accessible description. 
PASS A button's accessible name should come from its contents and it should have no accessible description. 
PASS Button with aria-describedby referencing the id of another element. 
PASS Button with aria-describedby referencing itself. 
PASS Button with aria-describedby referencing itself and the id of another element. 
PASS aria-describedby reference to nonexistant element. 
PASS aria-describedby reference to element with no text. 
PASS Button with aria-describedby reference to invisible element. 
PASS Button with aria-describedby reference to display-none element. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
